MacArthur Scale of Subjective Social Status - Youth Version
```{r}
Ladder<-left_join(filter(cleaned_survey_data, grepl("Ladder",item)) %>%
                 mutate(value=as.numeric(value)) %>% 
                                    filter(!grepl("Parent",survey_name)) %>%
                 filter(!is.na(value)) %>%
                 filter(!value=="") %>%
                 distinct(tagid,item,value,survey_name,.keep_all = FALSE) %>%
                 spread(item,value),
               redcap_cleaned %>%
                 filter(!is.na(dob),!is.na(sa_date)) %>%
                 dplyr::select(tagid, sa_date, sb_date, dob),by="tagid")

Ladder_Wave2<-left_join(Ladder,survey_date, by = c("tagid","survey_name")) %>% 
  distinct(tagid,survey_name,.keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(qualtrics_date=value) %>%
  dplyr::select(-value)%>%
  mutate(Ladder_Family=Ladder_1, Ladder_School=Ladder_3) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-Ladder_1, -Ladder_3) %>% 
  mutate(survey_date=ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 2 - V2",sb_date,
                            ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 2 - V1",sb_date,
                                   ifelse(survey_name=="TAG - Sess 2 - V3 - Current",sb_date,
                                                 ifelse(survey_name=="Sensitive Q's for 042",sb_date,as.character(qualtrics_date)
                                                 ))))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-qualtrics_date,-sb_date,-sa_date,-dob)
  

## Save it
Ladder_Wave1_TAG2_outdf <- Ladder_Wave2 %>% filter(!grepl("W2|W3|W4|W5|W6",survey_name)) %>% 
  filter(!grepl("TAG0|TAG1|TAG2",tagid))
write.csv(Ladder_Wave1_TAG2_outdf, file = paste0(workdir,"Qualtrics_Output/Wave1/Ladder_Wave1_TAG2.csv"))
```
